output

Class GanttChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • output.GanttChart

  • public class GanttChart
extends java.lang.Object
    Plot a Gantt Chart from a schedule. We require Gnuplot installed on the system to generate PDF output.
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GanttChart.Record
      Record of each task in the Gantt chart.

                         int period)
        Method to generate GNU plot file. We add a red vertical line to mark the period.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of output GNU plot file
        period - period from the model.

        private void chartGeneration(java.lang.String outputFileName,
                   int period)
        Generate the Gantt chart.
        Parameters:
        outputFileName - output file name for GNU plot file
        period - period of the schedule, -1 for non-pipelined schedule

        Plot the Gantt chart
        Parameters:

        sdfGraph - SDF graph
        outputFileName - output file name

      • plotChart

        public void plotChart(java.lang.String outputFileName,
             int period)
        Plot the Gantt chart. Records are added externally.
        Parameters:
        outputFileName - output file name
        period - period of the schedule, -1 for non-pipelined schedule

      • plotChart

        public void plotChart(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> model,
             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> taskDuration,
             java.lang.String outputFileName,
             int period)
        Plot the Gantt chart from the model and task durations.
        Parameters:
        model - Model containing start times and processor allocations
        taskDuration - duration of tasks
        outputFileName - output file name
        period - period of the schedule, -1 for non-pipelined

        Build records from the model
        Parameters:
        model - model containing start times and processor allocations
        taskDuration - task durations
